text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
As I'm discussing the day's training<n>schedule with
King Halo, a sudden noise<n>interrupts me.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: Thunk!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: OUCH!!! Geez, that hurt!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Having banged her own head on the<n>desk, King
Halo appears angry at<n>herself.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
O-of course not! I was just practicing<n>
headbutting!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, we need to be focusing on<n>today's
training plan!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...So where were we again?

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I knew it. She fell asleep in the middle of<n>our
conversation.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Gosh, there's no need for your concern.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Well, I did add a little bit of personaltraining to my schedule...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But only second-rates would admit<n>defeat this
early!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I shall endure the pain, overcome the<n>hardships,
and better myself! Ohohoho!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing as you're my trainer, I expect you<n>to be on
the same page. Now then, let's<n>get to training!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Goodbye to the old me, hello to the<n>new me!
Victory is calling my name!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Now, what kind of training will it be<n>today? Let's
go over it one more time!
choice_data_list: Today's plan is to take a nap on the grass.
We're doing some light training today.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me? I believe I told you that this<n>level of
fatigue is no problem at all.
choice_data_list: Shh, just come with me for a minute.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, come on! I've already prepared<n>myself to
start running!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You want me to lie down here and take<n>a nap?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Very well, then. I suppose even if I don't<n>actually
fall asleep, relaxing still has its<n>benefits.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'll resume training after the short break,<n>
understood?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Sigh... But I suppose it's not so bad lyingdown and gazing at the sky like this.Hehe...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Zzz... Zzz...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I-I wasn't sleeping, you know! I was just<n>relaxing!
For an extended period of<n>time!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Tomorrow, I'm going all out! I need to<n>make up
for today's lost time!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Following her deep sleep, King Halo is<n>brimming
with energy and motivation.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
What?! Didn't I just say that only<n>second-rates
give up this early?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Being first-rate means never giving up! It<n>means
moving forward even when the<n>going gets tough!
choice_data_list:
I understand, but let's try it and see how it
goes.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Sigh. Fine, but if I feel this isn't enough,then I'm taking matters into my ownhands.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
This should feel... far less strenuous...<n>than usual...
but my body won't move...
choice_data_list: This is just right, considering how tired you are.
This is just right, considering how tired you are.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I mean, ohohoho! Don't go getting the<n>wrong
idea about all this!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
This was a test! That's right, a test! To<n>make sure
you won't let your trainee<n>behave recklessly!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
You assigned me training that was<n>appropriate
for my condition... Quite a<n>fine response. I
present you with a<n>passing grade!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ohohoho! And with that, I am done for<n>the day!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Phew. I'm quite ready for a rest...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
This light dose of training proved to be<n>more than
enough for King Halo today.
